title: Ticket #3763: job_basic_kill issues
description:
The test ignores all signals and states when it is ignoring sigterm which we shoukd see if a kill is being sent to the job. So our job which blocks all the signals streams stdout back to the submit location.

We were killing it by condor_vacate, and then looking for sigterm ignored in the handler for evicted without checkpoint. Sometimes the job starts to run again(erasing data we need) before we get to look.

Switching to condor_hold and suitable adjustments to the test.
